meanings.definition: scientists who study the magnetic properties of rocks to determine the past positions of the Earth's magnetic poles.
meanings.sent1: Paleomagnetists use special tools to analyze rocks and understand Earth's magnetic history.
meanings.sent2: The paleomagnetists discovered fascinating details about the Earth's magnetic poles.
meanings.sent3: When the paleomagnetists found out where the poles used to be, they were shocked!
meanings.sent4: The work of paleomagnetists is like unraveling a magnetic mystery of the past.
meanings.sent5: The paleomagnetists' research paints a vivid picture of Earth's magnetic changes over time.
